home.title: Fluid QR by [bild:werk] medien
home.subtitle: A tool for creating dynamic links and QR codes.

logged.message: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".

home.info: The Fluid QR Platform enables the creation of a persistent and easily readable link that points to another link of your choice. The links created with Fluid QR can be distributed without hesitation and without the need to communicate a correction if your original link is changed. The adjustment of the link is done dynamically in the background via the Fluid QR platform. A downloadable QR code is provided for each Fluid QR link.
